description: Checks the status of a remote task running on one or more target devices.

parameters.name: managedDeviceId
parameters.description: The ID of the managed device.

parameters.name: taskId
parameters.description: The ID of the task that the action is describing.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedAt
nested_items.description: When the status of the execution was last updated.

nested_items.name: managedDeviceId
nested_items.description: The ID of the managed device that the task is being executed on.

nested_items.name: state
nested_items.description: The current state of the execution.

nested_items.name: taskId
nested_items.description: The ID of the task being executed on the device.
